content.rendered:
This item has a minimum order quantity of 10.

A beautiful addition to our range, the Seine oozes
sophistication and epitomizes the aesthetic brief of our new
Premier Range.

The Seine has a gorgeous, moving design that will never wither with age.

Available in a choice of faux leathers and wood stains as well as fabrics. 

This product comes with a 2 year guarantee.
